of the Shares to, in accordance with the directions of, the purchaser. The transferee shall not be bound to see to the application of
the purchase money nor shall the transferee&#8217;s title to the Shares be affected by any irregularity in, or invalidity of, the proceedings
in respect of the sale.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Reducing share capital</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">8.4</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Subject to the Act and to any rights for the time being conferred on the Members holding a particular
class of Shares, the Company may, by Special Resolution, reduce its share capital in any way.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">9</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Redemption and purchase of own Shares</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Power to issue redeemable Shares and to purchase
own Shares</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">9.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Subject to the Act and to any rights for the time being conferred on the Members holding a particular
class of Shares, the Company may by its Directors:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">issue Shares that are to be redeemed or liable to be redeemed, at the option of the Company or the Member
holding those redeemable Shares, on the terms and in the manner its Directors determine before the issue of those Shares;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">with the consent by Special Resolution of the Members holding Shares of a particular class, vary the rights
attaching to that class of Shares so as to provide that those Shares are to be redeemed or are liable to be redeemed at the option of
the Company on the terms and in the manner which the Directors determine at the time of such variation; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">purchase all or any of its own Shares of any class including any redeemable Shares on the terms and in
the manner which the Directors determine at the time of such purchase.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify">The Company may make a payment in
respect of the redemption or purchase of its own Shares in any manner authorised by the Act, including out of any combination of the following:
capital, its profits and the proceeds of a fresh issue of Shares.</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 21; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->16<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Power to pay for redemption or purchase in
cash or in specie</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>




<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">9.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">When making a payment in respect of the redemption or purchase of Shares, the Directors may make the payment
in cash or <I>in specie</I> (or partly in one and partly in the other) if so authorised by the terms of the allotment of those Shares
or by the terms applying to those Shares in accordance with Article 9.1, or otherwise by agreement with the Member holding those Shares.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Effect of redemption or purchase of a Share</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">9.3</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Upon the date of redemption or purchase of a Share:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Member holding that Share shall cease to be entitled to any rights in respect of the Share other than
the right to receive:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(i)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the price for the Share; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(ii)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">any dividend declared in respect of the Share prior to the date of redemption or purchase;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Member&#8217;s name shall be removed from the register of Members with respect to the Share; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Share shall be cancelled or held as a Treasury Share, as the Directors may determine.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">9.4</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">For the purpose of Article 9.3, the date of redemption or purchase is the date when the Member's name
is removed from the register of Members with respect to the Shares the subject of the redemption or purchase.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Meetings of Members</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Annual and extraordinary general meetings</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Company may, but shall not (unless required by the Designated Stock Exchange Rules) be obligated to,
in each year hold a general meeting as an annual general meeting, which, if held, shall be convened by the Board, in accordance with these
Articles.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">All general meetings other than annual general meetings shall be called extraordinary general meetings.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Power to call meetings</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.3</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Directors may call a general meeting at any time.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.4</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If there are insufficient Directors to constitute a quorum and the remaining Directors are unable to agree
on the appointment of additional Directors, the Directors must call a general meeting for the purpose of appointing additional Directors.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.5</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Directors must also call a general meeting if requisitioned in the manner set out in the next two
Articles.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.6</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The requisition must be in writing and given by one or more Members who together hold at least ten per
cent of the rights to vote at such general meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 22; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->17<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.7</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The requisition must also:</TD></TR></TABLE>




<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">specify the purpose of the meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">be signed by or on behalf of each requisitioner (and for this purpose each joint holder shall be obliged
to sign). The requisition may consist of several documents in like form signed by one or more of the requisitioners; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">be delivered in accordance with the notice provisions.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.8</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Should the Directors fail to call a general meeting within 21 Clear Days&#8217; from the date of receipt
of a requisition, the requisitioners or any of them may call a general meeting within three months after the end of that period.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.9</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Without limitation to the foregoing, if there are insufficient Directors to constitute a quorum and the
remaining Directors are unable to agree on the appointment of additional Directors, any one or more Members who together hold at least
five per cent of the rights to vote at a general meeting may call a general meeting for the purpose of considering the business specified
in the notice of meeting which shall include as an item of business the appointment of additional Directors.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.10</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If the Members call a meeting under the above provisions, the Company shall reimburse their reasonable
expenses.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Content of notice</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.11</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Notice of a general meeting shall specify each of the following:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the date and the hour of the meeting;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">whether the meeting will be held virtually, at a physical place or both;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">if the meeting is to be held in any part at a physical place, the address of such place;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(d)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">if the meeting is to be held in two or more places or in any part virtually, the technology that will
be used to facilitate the meeting;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(e)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">subject to paragraph (f) and the requirements of (to the extent applicable) the Designated Stock Exchange
Rules, the general nature of the business to be transacted; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(f)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">if a resolution is proposed as a Special Resolution, the text of that resolution.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.12</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">In each notice there shall appear with reasonable prominence the following statements:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">that a Member who is entitled to attend and vote is entitled to appoint one or more proxies to attend
and vote instead of that Member; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">that a proxyholder need not be a Member.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Period of notice</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.13</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">At least ten (10) days' notice (exclusive of the day on which the notice is served or deemed to be served,
but inclusive of the day for which the notice is given) of any general meeting must be given to Members.</TD></TR></TABLE>




<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 23; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->18<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.14</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Subject to the Act, a meeting may be convened on shorter notice, subject to the Act with the consent of
the Member or Members who, individually or collectively, hold at least ninety per cent of the voting rights of all those who have a right
to vote at that meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Record date and persons entitled to receive
notice</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.15</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Subject to the provisions of these Articles and to any restrictions imposed on any Shares, the notice
shall be given to the following people:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Members</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">persons entitled to a Share in consequence of the death or bankruptcy of a Member;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Directors; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(d)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Auditors.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.16</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Board may determine that the Members entitled to receive notice of and vote at a meeting are those
persons entered on the register of Members at the close of business on a day determined by the Board.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Accidental omission to give notice or non-receipt
of notice</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.17</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Proceedings at a meeting shall not be invalidated by the following:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">an accidental failure to give notice of the meeting to any person entitled to notice; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">non-receipt of notice of the meeting by any person entitled to notice.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">10.18</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">In addition, where a notice of meeting is published on a website proceedings at the meeting shall not
be invalidated merely because it is accidentally published:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">in a different place on the website; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">for part only of the period from the date of the notification until the conclusion of the meeting to which
the notice relates.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Proceedings at meetings of Members</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Quorum</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Save as provided in the following Article, no business shall be transacted at any meeting unless a quorum
is present in person or by proxy. A quorum is as follows:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">if the Company has only one Member: that Member;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">if the Company has more than one Member: one or more Members holding Shares that represent not less than
one-third of the votes that may be cast by holders of the outstanding Shares carrying the right to vote at such general meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 24; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->19<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Lack of quorum</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>




<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If a quorum is not present within fifteen minutes of the time appointed for the meeting, or if at any
time during the meeting it becomes inquorate, then the following provisions apply:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If the meeting was requisitioned by Members, it shall be cancelled.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">In any other case, the meeting shall stand adjourned to the same time and place seven days hence, or to
such other time or place as is determined by the Directors. If a quorum is not present within fifteen minutes of the time appointed for
the adjourned meeting, then the Members present in person or by proxy shall constitute a quorum.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Chairman</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.3</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The chairman of a general meeting shall be the chairman of the Board or such other person as the Directors
may determine. Absent any such person being present within fifteen minutes of the time appointed for the meeting, the Directors present
shall elect one of their number to chair the meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.4</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If no Director is present within fifteen minutes of the time appointed for the meeting, or if no Director
is willing to act as chairman, the Members present in person or by proxy and entitled to vote shall choose one of their number to chair
the meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Right of a Director to attend and speak</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.5</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Even if a Director is not a Member, he shall be entitled to attend and speak at any general meeting and
at any separate meeting of Members holding a particular class of Shares.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Accommodation of Members attending meeting
virtually</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.6</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A Member entitled to receive notice and attend a meeting will be deemed to be in attendance at such meeting
despite their attendance being virtual if adequate facilities are available to ensure that the Member is able to:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">participate in the business for which the meeting has been convened; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">hear all that happens at the meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Security</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.7</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">In addition to any measures which the Board may be required to take due to the location or venue of the
meeting, the Board may make any arrangement and impose any restriction it considers appropriate and reasonable in the circumstances to
ensure the security of a meeting including, without limitation, the searching of any person attending the meeting and the imposing of
restrictions on the items of personal property that may be taken into the meeting place. The Board may refuse entry to, or eject from,
a meeting a person who refuses to comply with any such arrangements or restrictions.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Adjournment, postponement and cancellation</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.8</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A meeting may be:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">postponed or cancelled prior to the meeting at the discretion of the Directors by written notice provided
to all persons entitled to attend the meeting, unless the meeting was requisitioned by Members or otherwise called by Members pursuant
to Article 10.8; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 25; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->20<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>




<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">adjourned, with or without an appointed date for resumption, at any time during the meeting at the discretion
of the chairman with the consent of the Members constituting a quorum.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.9</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The chairman must adjourn a meeting if so directed by Members constituting a quorum at the meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.10</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">No business can be transacted at an adjourned meeting other than business which might properly have been
transacted at the original meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.11</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Should a meeting be adjourned for more than 7 Clear Days, whether because of a lack of quorum or otherwise,
Members shall be given at least seven Clear Days' notice of the date, time and place of the adjourned meeting and the general nature of
the business to be transacted. Otherwise it shall not be necessary to give any notice of the adjournment.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Method of voting</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.12</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A resolution put to the vote of the meeting shall be decided on a show of hands unless before, or on,
the declaration of the result of the show of hands, a poll is duly demanded. Subject to the Act, a poll may be demanded:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">by the chairman of the meeting;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">by at least two Members having the right to vote on the resolutions;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">by any Member or Members present who, individually or collectively, hold at least ten per cent of the
voting rights of all those who have a right to vote on the resolution.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Outcome of vote by show of hands</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.13</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Unless a poll is duly demanded, a declaration by the chairman as to the result of a resolution and an
entry to that effect in the minutes of the meeting shall be conclusive evidence of the outcome of a show of hands without proof of the
number or proportion of the votes recorded in favour of or against the resolution.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Withdrawal of demand for a poll</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.14</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The demand for a poll may be withdrawn before the poll is taken, but only with the consent of the chairman.
The chairman shall announce any such withdrawal to the meeting and, unless another person forthwith demands a poll, any earlier show of
hands on that resolution shall be treated as the vote on that resolution; if there has been no earlier show of hands, then the resolution
shall be put to the vote of the meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Taking of a poll</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.15</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A poll demanded on the question of adjournment shall be taken immediately.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.16</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A poll demanded on any other question shall be taken either immediately or at an adjourned meeting at
such time and place as the chairman directs, not being more than thirty Clear Days after the poll was demanded.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.17</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The demand for a poll shall not prevent the meeting continuing to transact any business other than the
question on which the poll was demanded.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 26; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->21<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>




<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.18</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A poll shall be taken in such manner as the chairman directs. He may appoint scrutineers (who need not
be Members) and fix a place and time for declaring the result of the poll. If, through the aid of technology, the meeting is held virtually
or in more than place, the chairman may appoint scrutineers virtually and in more than place; but if he considers that the poll cannot
be effectively monitored at that meeting, the chairman shall adjourn the holding of the poll to a date, place and time when that can occur.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Chairman&#8217;s casting vote</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.19</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">In the case of an equality of votes, whether on a show of hands or on a poll, the Chairman of the meeting
at which the show of hands takes place or at which the poll is demanded shall not be entitled to a second or casting vote.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Written resolutions</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.20</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Members may pass a resolution in writing without holding a meeting if the following conditions are met:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">all Members entitled to vote are given notice of the resolution as if the same were being proposed at
a meeting of Members;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">all Members entitled so to vote;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(i)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">sign a document; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(ii)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">sign several documents in the like form each signed by one or more of those Members; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the signed document or documents is or are delivered to the Company, including, if the Company so nominates,
by delivery of an Electronic Record by Electronic means to the address specified for that purpose.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0in">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0in">Such written resolution
shall be as effective as if it had been passed at a meeting of the Members entitled to vote duly convened and held.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.21</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If a written resolution is described as a Special Resolution or as an Ordinary Resolution, it has effect
accordingly.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.22</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Directors may determine the manner in which written resolutions shall be put to Members. In particular,
they may provide, in the form of any written resolution, for each Member to indicate, out of the number of votes the Member would have
been entitled to cast at a meeting to consider the resolution, how many votes he wishes to cast in favour of the resolution and how many
against the resolution or to be treated as abstentions. The result of any such written resolution shall be determined on the same basis
as on a poll.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Sole-Member Company</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">11.23</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If the Company has only one Member, and the Member records in writing his decision on a question, that
record shall constitute both the passing of a resolution and the minute of it.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Voting rights of Members</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Right to vote</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>




<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Unless their Shares carry no right to vote, or unless a call or other amount presently payable has not
been paid, all Members are entitled to vote at a general meeting, whether on a show of hands or on a poll, and all Members holding Shares
of a particular class of Shares are entitled to vote at a meeting of the holders of that class of Shares.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 27; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->22<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Members may vote in person or by proxy.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.3</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">On a show of hands, every Member shall have one vote. For the avoidance of doubt, an individual who represents
two or more Members, including a Member in that individual&#8217;s own right, that individual shall be entitled to a separate vote for
each Member.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.4</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">On a poll, a Member shall have one vote for each Share they hold, unless any Share carries special voting
rights.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.5</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">No Member is bound to vote on his Shares or any of them; nor is he bound to vote each of his Shares in
the same way.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Rights of joint holders</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.6</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If Shares are held jointly, only one of the joint holders may vote. If more than one of the joint holders
tenders a vote, the vote of the holder whose name in respect of those Shares appears first in the register of Members shall be accepted
to the exclusion of the votes of the other joint holder.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Representation of corporate Members</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.7</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Save where otherwise provided, a corporate Member must act by a duly authorised representative.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.8</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A corporate Member wishing to act by a duly authorised representative must identify that person to the
Company by notice in writing.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.9</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The authorisation may be for any period of time, and must be delivered to the Company before the commencement
of the meeting at which it is first used.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.10</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Directors of the Company may require the production of any evidence which they consider necessary
to determine the validity of the notice.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">12.11</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Where a duly authorised representative is present at a meeting that Member is deemed to be present in
person; and the acts of the duly authorised representative are personal acts of that Member.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
