<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(ii)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">a company which is or was a subsidiary of the Company;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>




<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(iii)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">a company in which the Company has or had an interest (whether direct or indirect); and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">a trustee of an employee or retirement benefits scheme or other trust in which any of the persons referred
to in paragraph (a) is or was interested.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Notices</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Form of notices</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Save where these Articles provide otherwise, and subject to the Designated Stock Exchange Rules, any notice
to be given to or by any person pursuant to these Articles shall be:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">in writing signed by or on behalf of the giver in the manner set out below for written notices; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">subject to the next Article, in an Electronic Record signed by or on behalf of the giver by Electronic
Signature and authenticated in accordance with Articles about authentication of Electronic Records; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">where these Articles expressly permit, by the Company by means of a website.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Electronic communications</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A notice may only be given to the Company in an Electronic Record if:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Directors so resolve or otherwise accept the notice; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">any Director or Officer provides the giver of the notice an electronic address to which the notice may
be sent and a notice is sent to that address within a reasonable period of time.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.3</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A notice may not be given by Electronic Record to a person other than the Company unless the recipient
has provided the giver of the notice an electronic address to which notice may be sent.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.4</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Subject to the Act, the Designated Stock Exchange Rules and to any other rules which the Company is bound
to follow, the Company may also send any notice or other document pursuant to these Articles to a Member by publishing that notice or
other document on a website where:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Company and the Member have agreed to his having access to the notice or document on a website (instead
of it being sent to him);</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the notice or document is one to which that agreement applies;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Member is notified (in accordance with any requirements laid down by the Act and, in a manner for
the time being agreed between him and the Company for the purpose) of:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(i)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the publication of the notice or document on a website;</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(ii)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the address of that website; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 48; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->43<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 106.3pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.4pt">&nbsp;</P>




<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 70.9pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.4pt">(iii)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the place on that website where the notice or document may be accessed, and how it may be accessed; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(d)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the notice or document is published on that website throughout the publication period, provided that,
if the notice or document is published on that website for a part, but not all of, the publication period, the notice or document shall
be treated as being published throughout that period if the failure to publish that notice of document throughout that period is wholly
attributable to circumstances which it would not be reasonable to have expected the Company to prevent or avoid. For the purposes of this
Article 28.4 &quot;publication period&quot; means a period of not less than twenty-one days, beginning on the day on which the notification
referred to in Article 28.4(c) is deemed sent.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Persons entitled to notices</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.5</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Any notice or other document to be given to a Member may be given by reference to the register of Members
as it stands at any time within the period of twenty-one days before the day that the notice is given or (where and as applicable) within
any other period permitted by, or in accordance with the requirements of, (to the extent applicable) the Designated Stock Exchange Rules
and/or the Designated Stock Exchanges. No change in the register of Members after that time shall invalidate the giving of such notice
or document or require the Company to give such item to any other person.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Persons authorised to give notices</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.6</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A notice by either the Company or a Member pursuant to these Articles may be given on behalf of the Company
or a Member by a Director or company secretary of the Company or a Member.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Delivery of written notices</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.7</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Save where these Articles provide otherwise, a notice in writing may be given personally to the recipient,
or left at (as appropriate) the Member&#8217;s or Director&#8217;s registered address or the Company&#8217;s registered office, or posted
to that registered address or registered office.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Joint holders</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.8</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Where Members are joint holders of a Share, all notices shall be given to the Member whose name first
appears in the register of Members.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Signatures</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.9</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A written notice shall be signed when it is autographed by or on behalf of the giver, or is marked in
such a way as to indicate its execution or adoption by the giver.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.10</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">An Electronic Record may be signed by an Electronic Signature.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0in"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0in"><B>Evidence of transmission</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.11</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A notice given by Electronic Record shall be deemed sent if an Electronic Record is kept demonstrating
the time, date and content of the transmission, and if no notification of failure to transmit is received by the giver.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.12</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A notice given in writing shall be deemed sent if the giver can provide proof that the envelope containing
the notice was properly addressed, pre-paid and posted, or that the written notice was otherwise properly transmitted to the recipient.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0">&nbsp;</P>


<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 49; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->44<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.13</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A Member present, either in person or by proxy, at any meeting of the Company or of the holders of any
class of Shares shall be deemed to have received due notice of the meeting and, where requisite, of the purposes for which it was called.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Giving notice to a deceased or bankrupt Member</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.14</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A notice may be given by the Company to the persons entitled to a Share in consequence of the death or
bankruptcy of a Member by sending or delivering it, in any manner authorised by these Articles for the giving of notice to a Member, addressed
to them by name, or by the title of representatives of the deceased, or trustee of the bankrupt or by any like description, at the address,
if any, supplied for that purpose by the persons claiming to be so entitled.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.15</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Until such an address has been supplied, a notice may be given in any manner in which it might have been
given if the death or bankruptcy had not occurred.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Date of giving notices</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.16</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A notice is given on the date identified in the following table</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD>&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
                                                                                                                                                                        </TABLE>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; border-collapse: collapse">
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border: Black 1pt solid; width: 50%">
    <P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>Method for giving notices</B></P></TD>
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-top: Black 1pt solid; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; width: 50%; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt"><B>When taken to be given</B></FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; border-left: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">(A) Personally</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">At the time and date of delivery</FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; border-left: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">(B) By leaving it at the Member's registered address</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">At the time and date it was left</FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; border-left: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">(C) By posting it by prepaid post to the street or postal address of that recipient</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">48 hours after the date it was posted</FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; border-left: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">(D) By Electronic Record (other than publication on a website), to recipient's Electronic address</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">48 hours after the date it was sent</FONT></TD></TR>
  <TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; border-left: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">(E) By publication on a website</FONT></TD>
    <TD STYLE="padding: 2pt; border-right: Black 1pt solid; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 10pt">24 hours after the date on which the Member is deemed to have been notified of the publication of the notice or document on the website</FONT></TD></TR>
  </TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Saving provision</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">28.17</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">None of the preceding notice provisions shall derogate from the Articles about the delivery of written
resolutions of Directors and written resolutions of Members.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">29</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Authentication of Electronic Records</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Application of Articles</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">29.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Without limitation to any other provision of these Articles, any notice, written resolution or other document
under these Articles that is sent by Electronic means by a Member, or by the Secretary, or by a Director or other Officer of the Company,
shall be deemed to be authentic if either Article 29.2 or Article 29.4 applies.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Authentication of documents sent by Members
by Electronic means</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">29.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">An Electronic Record of a notice, written resolution or other document sent by Electronic means by or
on behalf of one or more Members shall be deemed to be authentic if the following conditions are satisfied:</TD></TR></TABLE>




<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Member or each Member, as the case may be, signed the original document, and for this purpose <B>Original
Document</B> includes several documents in like form signed by one or more of those Members; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 50; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->45<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Electronic Record of the Original Document was sent by Electronic means by, or at the direction of,
that Member to an address specified in accordance with these Articles for the purpose for which it was sent; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Article 29.7 does not apply.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">29.3</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">For example, where a sole Member signs a resolution and sends the Electronic Record of the original resolution,
or causes it to be sent, by facsimile transmission to the address in these Articles specified for that purpose, the facsimile copy shall
be deemed to be the written resolution of that Member unless Article 28.7 applies.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Authentication of document sent by the Secretary
or Officers of the Company by Electronic means</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">29.4</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">An Electronic Record of a notice, written resolution or other document sent by or on behalf of the Secretary
or an Officer or Officers of the Company shall be deemed to be authentic if the following conditions are satisfied:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Secretary or the Officer or each Officer, as the case may be, signed the original document, and for
this purpose <B>Original Document</B> includes several documents in like form signed by the Secretary or one or more of those Officers;
and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Electronic Record of the Original Document was sent by Electronic means by, or at the direction of,
the Secretary or that Officer to an address specified in accordance with these Articles for the purpose for which it was sent; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Article 29.7 does not apply.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify">This Article 29.4 applies whether
the document is sent by or on behalf of the Secretary or Officer in his own right or as a representative of the Company.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">29.5</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">For example, where a sole Director signs a resolution and scans the resolution, or causes it to be scanned,
as a PDF version which is attached to an email sent to the address in these Articles specified for that purpose, the PDF version shall
be deemed to be the written resolution of that Director unless Article 29.7 applies.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Manner of signing</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">29.6</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">For the purposes of these Articles about the authentication of Electronic Records, a document will be
taken to be signed if it is signed manually or in any other manner permitted by these Articles.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Saving provision</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">29.7</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">A notice, written resolution or other document under these Articles will not be deemed to be authentic
if the recipient, acting reasonably:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">believes that the signature of the signatory has been altered after the signatory had signed the original
document; or</TD></TR></TABLE>




<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">believes that the original document, or the Electronic Record of it, was altered, without the approval
of the signatory, after the signatory signed the original document; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(c)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">otherwise doubts the authenticity of the Electronic Record of the document</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify">and the recipient promptly gives notice
to the sender setting the grounds of its objection. If the recipient invokes this Article, the sender may seek to establish the authenticity
of the Electronic Record in any way the sender thinks fit.</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 51; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->46<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="break-before: page; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 12pt"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">30</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Transfer by way of continuation</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">30.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Company may, by Special Resolution, resolve to be registered by way of continuation in a jurisdiction
outside:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">the Cayman Islands; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">such other jurisdiction in which it is, for the time being, incorporated, registered or existing.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">30.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">To give effect to any resolution made pursuant to the preceding Article, the Directors may cause the following:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">an application be made to the Registrar of Companies of the Cayman Islands to deregister the Company in
the Cayman Islands or in the other jurisdiction in which it is for the time being incorporated, registered or existing; and</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">all such further steps as they consider appropriate to be taken to effect the transfer by way of continuation
of the Company.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">31</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Winding up</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Distribution of assets in specie</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">31.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">If the Company is wound up the Members may, subject to these Articles and any other sanction required
by the Act, pass a Special Resolution allowing the liquidator to do either or both of the following:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">in accordance with any rights attaching to the Shares, to divide in specie among the Members the whole
or any part of the assets of the Company and, for that purpose, to value any assets and to determine how the division shall be carried
out as between the Members or different classes of Members; and/or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">to vest the whole or any part of the assets in trustees for the benefit of Members and those liable to
contribute to the winding up.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">No obligation to accept liability</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">31.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">No Member shall be compelled to accept any assets if an obligation attaches to them.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">31.3</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Directors are authorised to present a winding up petition</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>




<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">31.4</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">The Directors have the authority to present a petition for the winding up of the Company to the Grand
Court of the Cayman Islands on behalf of the Company without the sanction of a resolution passed at a general meeting.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">32</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Amendment of Memorandum and Articles</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Power to change name or amend Memorandum</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">32.1</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Subject to the Act, the Company may, by Special Resolution:</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(a)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">change its name; or</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 70.9pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">(b)</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">change the provisions of its Memorandum with respect to its objects, powers or any other matter specified
in the Memorandum.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Power to amend these Articles</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 35.45pt">32.2</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify">Subject to the Act and as provided in these Articles, the Company may, by Special Resolution, amend these
Articles in whole or in part.</TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 35.45pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: -35.45pt"></P>

<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 52; Options: Last -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1.5pt solid"><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 60%">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 20%"><IMG SRC="ex3-1_002.jpg" ALT="">&nbsp;</TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->47<!-- Field: /Sequence --></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Filed: 07-Aug-2025 10:29 EST</I></TD></TR><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-align: left"><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center">&nbsp;</TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>www.verify.gov.ky File#: 412987</I></TD><TD STYLE="padding-top: 2pt; text-align: center"><I>Auth Code: F17059919996</I></TD></TR></TABLE><P STYLE="text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></P></DIV>

</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-99.1
<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>ea025239101ex99-1_whitefiber.htm
<DESCRIPTION>PRESS RELEASE DATED AUGUST 6, 2025, ANNOUNCING THE PRICING OF THE IPO
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
     <TITLE></TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: right"><B>Exhibit 99.1</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>WhiteFiber Announces Pricing of Upsized Initial
Public Offering</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>NEW YORK, August 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ &mdash;
WhiteFiber, Inc. (&ldquo;WhiteFiber&rdquo; or the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;)</B>,&nbsp;today announced the pricing of its upsized initial
public offering of 9,375,000 ordinary shares at a public offering price of $17.00 per share. In connection with the offering, WhiteFiber
has granted the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase up to an additional 1,406,250 ordinary shares at the initial public offering
price, less underwriting discounts and commissions.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">The ordinary shares are expected to begin trading
on The Nasdaq Capital Market on August 7, 2025 under the symbol &ldquo;WYFI.&rdquo;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">The closing of the offering is expected to occur
on August 8, 2025, subject to the satisfaction of customary closing conditions.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">B. Riley Securities and Needham &amp; Company
are acting as the joint book-running managers for the offering. Macquarie Capital is also acting as a book-runner for the offering. Roth
Capital Partners is acting as lead manager for the offering. Craig-Hallum and Clear Street are acting as co-managers for the offering.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">A registration statement relating to these securities
has been filed with the SEC and was declared effective on August 6, 2025. The offering is being made solely by means of a prospectus.
Copies of the final prospectus, when available, may be obtained from: B. Riley Securities, 1300 17<SUP>th</SUP>&nbsp;Street North, Suite
1300,&nbsp;Arlington, VA&nbsp;22209, Attention: Prospectus Department, by telephone at (703) 312-9580 or by email at&nbsp;<B>prospectuses@brileysecurities.com</B>;
or from: Needham &amp; Company, LLC, 250 Park Avenue, 10th Floor,&nbsp;New York, NY&nbsp;10177, Attn: Prospectus Department,&nbsp;<B>prospectus@needhamco.com</B>&nbsp;or
by telephone at (800) 903-3268.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">This press release does not constitute an offer
to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy these securities, nor shall there be any sale of these securities in any state or jurisdiction
in which such offer, solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or qualification under the securities laws of any such
state or jurisdiction.</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>About WhiteFiber</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">WhiteFiber is a provider of artificial intelligence
(&ldquo;AI&rdquo;) infrastructure solutions. WhiteFiber owns high-performance computing data centers and provides cloud services to customers.
Our vertically integrated model combines specialized colocation, hosting, and cloud services engineered to maximize performance, efficiency,
and margin for generative AI workloads. In connection with this offering, WhiteFiber is being carved out of Bit Digital, Inc. and will
operate as a separate public company upon the completion of this offering.</P>



<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><B>Forward-Looking Statements&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Certain statements in this press release may
constitute forward-looking statements. All statements, other than statements of historical fact, included herein are &ldquo;forward-looking
statements.&rdquo; These forward-looking statements are often identified by the use of forward-looking terminology such as &ldquo;believes,&rdquo;
&ldquo;intends,&rdquo; &ldquo;expects,&rdquo; or similar expressions, involving known and unknown risks and uncertainties. These forward-looking
statements may be included throughout this press release, and include, but are not limited to, statements relating to the expected timing
for trading of the Company&rsquo;s ordinary shares on The Nasdaq Capital Market and the expected timing for the closing of the offering.
By their nature, forward-looking statements are not statements of historical fact or guarantees of future performance and are subject
to risks, uncertainties, assumptions or changes in circumstances that are difficult to predict or quantify. Although the Company believes
that the expectations reflected in these forward-looking statements are reasonable, they do involve assumptions, risks and uncertainties,
and these expectations may prove to be incorrect. Investing in our securities involves a high degree of risk. Any forward-looking statement
in this press release speaks only as of the date of this release. The Company undertakes no obligation to publicly update or review any
forward-looking statement, whether as a result of new information, future developments or otherwise, except as may be required by any
applicable securities laws.&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">Investor Contact:&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">IR@whitefiber.com&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-99.2
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>ea025239101ex99-2_whitefiber.htm
<DESCRIPTION>PRESS RELEASE DATED AUGUST 8, 2025, ANNOUNCING THE CLOSING OF THE IPO
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
     <TITLE></TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: right"><B>Exhibit 99.2</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>WhiteFiber
Announces Closing of Upsized Initial Public Offering</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>NEW
YORK, August 8, 2025 /PRNewswire/ &mdash; WhiteFiber, Inc. (Nasdaq: WYFI) (&ldquo;WhiteFiber&rdquo; or the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;)</B>,&nbsp;today
announced the closing of its upsized initial public offering of 9,375,000 ordinary shares at a public offering price of $17.00 per share.
The ordinary shares began trading on The Nasdaq Capital Market on August 7, 2025 under the symbol &ldquo;WYFI.&rdquo;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">WhiteFiber
received aggregate gross proceeds of $159.4 million from the initial public offering, before deducting underwriting discounts and commissions
and offering expenses. In addition, WhiteFiber granted the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase up to an additional 1,406,250 ordinary
shares at the initial public offering price, less underwriting discounts and commissions.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">B.
Riley Securities and Needham &amp; Company acted as the joint book-running managers for the offering. Macquarie Capital also acted as
a book-runner for the offering. Roth Capital Partners acted as lead manager for the offering. Craig-Hallum and Clear Street acted as
co-managers for the offering.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">A
registration statement relating to these securities was filed with the SEC and declared effective on August 6, 2025. The offering was
made solely by means of a prospectus. Copies of the final prospectus may be obtained from: B. Riley Securities, 1300 17<SUP>th</SUP>&nbsp;Street
North, Suite 1300,&nbsp;Arlington, VA&nbsp;22209, Attention: Prospectus Department, by telephone at (703) 312-9580 or by email at&nbsp;<B>prospectuses@brileysecurities.com</B>;
or from: Needham &amp; Company, LLC, 250 Park Avenue, 10th Floor,&nbsp;New York, NY&nbsp;10177, Attn: Prospectus Department,&nbsp;<B>prospectus@needhamco.com</B>&nbsp;or
by telephone at (800) 903-3268.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">This
press release does not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy these securities, nor shall there be any sale
of these securities in any state or jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or
qualification under the securities laws of any such state or jurisdiction.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>About
WhiteFiber</B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">WhiteFiber
is a provider of artificial intelligence (&ldquo;AI&rdquo;) infrastructure solutions. WhiteFiber owns high-performance computing data
centers and provides cloud services to customers. Our vertically integrated model combines specialized colocation, hosting, and cloud
services engineered to maximize performance, efficiency, and margin for generative AI workloads. In connection with this offering, WhiteFiber
is being carved out of Bit Digital, Inc. and will operate as a separate public company upon the completion of this offering.</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">Investor
Contact:</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt">IR@whitefiber.com</FONT></P>

<SEQUENCE>13
<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
.report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

.report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

.report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

.report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

.report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

.report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

.report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
.pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
.report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

.report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
.report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

.report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

.report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

	width: 200px;
}

	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */

	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */

	background-color: #f0f0f0;

	background-color: #def;
}

	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */

	background-color: white;
}

.report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

.report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */

	white-space: nowrap;
}

	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

	padding-left: 2em;
}

	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */

	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}
